page.name: Key Idea: Measure goals in multiple ways.
page.content: Goals are most powerful when we can clearly “see” that we are accomplishing them. Learners need to see they are making progress toward their goals. This can be done by setting milestones or by breaking long-term goals into smaller steps. Learners also need to see and celebrate when they have achieved the final step in their goal. Educators should regularly point out and highlight skill and knowledge growth as learners are working towards their goals.
